habilidadesdesc: I'm a true believer of the fact that learning never stops, and I'm interested in learning new technologies and programming languages that helps me to improve even more my skills as Software Developer.

explabdesc1: I'm in charge of developing and designing the functionalities of the system under development according to the specifications proposed by the architects. In addition to carrying out the necessary test that the functionalities made by other developers must pass.
presentacion: I'm an enthusiastic Fullstack Software Developer based in Dominican Republic, with barely 1 year of experience developing web apps.
